snippet: Outside linebacker Robert Mathis announced Friday he will retire following the Indianapolis Colts' season finale against Jacksonville on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Outside linebacker Robert Mathis announced Friday he will retire following the Indianapolis Colts' season finale against Jacksonville on Sunday.

headline.main: Mathis Plans to Retire Following Colts' Season Finale
headline.print_headline: Mathis Plans to Retire Following Colts' Season Finale
